name: Manual QA Engineer
description:
What to do:
  • Test analysis;
  • Test design (test cases, checklists);
  • Functional, non-functional and regression testing of desktop and web apps;
  • Bug reporting
  • Communication with project team.
What we expect:
  • At least 3 years of commercial experience in functional testing;
  • Experience testing web and desktop applications;
  • Experience in integration and system testing;
  • Experience in testing frontend (JS/HTML/CSS - DevTools) and backend (REST API/gRPC - Postman, Swagger);
  • Experience in reading app logs to detect and pinpoint issues;
  • Knowledge and practical application of test design methodologies;
  • Experience working with test management platforms like Allure TestOps, Qase, etc.
  • Experience using task tracking tools like YouTrack, Trello, Asana, etc.;
  • Strong analytical skills and attention to detail;
  • Experience working on projects with minimal documentation;
  • Ability to work without supervision, independently set goals and priorities in testing, assign tasks, promptly identify and articulate problems, and understand the importance of feedback;

Nice to have:

  • Knowledge of Python (basic level);
  • Experience in writing API and UI autotests.

Условия:

  • Work on cool projects on a global scale;
  • The opportunity to grow in a team of strong professionals;
  • Absence of formalism and bureaucracy;
  • Mandatory operational feedback on results.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
